document.full_text: high scoring washington capitals captain alex ovechkin will miss seven to 10 days of action with an undisclosed ailment, the team said on monday.
document.title: alex ovechkin out for seven to ten days with undisclosed ailment
lines_and_colors: high scoring washington capitals captain alex ovechkin will miss seven to 10 days of action with an undisclosed ailment, the team said on monday.
